mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (nickname, email, website, avatar, ip, content, page, status, notice, create_time, parentCommentId, blog_id) VALUES (#{nickname}, #{email}, #{website}, #{avatar}, #{ip}, #{content}, #{page}, #{status}, #{notice}, NOW(), #{parentCommentId}, #{blogId})
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, a.title as title FROM comment c LEFT JOIN article a ON c.blog_id = a.id ORDER BY c.create_time DESCcomment
